version_description:
- Support for Multitasking on iPad - the app can now be used in Slide Over / Split View mode
- Pull-to-refresh gesture added in Bookmarks/History to manually fetch records from iCloud
- Derivatives, idioms and phrasal verbs can now be added to Bookmarks
- Example sentences can now be played at a slower speed (Settings > Audio)
- Bug fixes
- Content updates

- Fixed a bug that affected Slide Over / Split View mode
- Fixed the inter-app search between OALECD and OBEDEC
- Content updates

- Dictionary content updates
- Automatically search copied word in split-screen
- For Bookmarks Sync, added “Replace iCloud Data” option to overwrite iCloud data with device data
- Sync Settings migrated to CloudKit to fix slowdowns
- Arrow buttons to browse Bookmarks/History/Word Lists more easily on an iPhone
- Select words from History for Flash Cards
- Other bug fixes
- App no longer crashes when a word is cut or copied from the Search field

- Dictionary content updates
- Search Chinese in definitions and examples
- Bug fixes

- Dictionary content updates
- Support for the new 5.8" display
- Bug fixes

- Fixed some issues in Content
- The new "Oxford English-Chinese Dictionaries" app had been released. The new app includes this title and "Oxford Learner's Thesaurus" and "Oxford Collocations Dictionary (2nd edition). Existing Advanced Learner's user can activate the Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Chinese Dictionary (8th edition) in the new app for free.

- Dictionary content updates
- Support for the new 5.8" display
- Bug fixes
Fixed a bug which caused the Alert to show up abnormally.
- Fixed a CSS bug which caused the Idioms/Phrasal Verbs missing from the Entry result screen
- CSS of the A-Z entry failed to load in the last release.
Fixed Keyboard Settings and the Clear Search button
